name: Relationships of the Heart Conference/Workshop
content: We assist people to navigate through their world of relationships in three areas of the christian life. 1- Our Relationship with Jesus Christ. 2- Our Relationship in Community with Other Believers. 3- The Heartbeat of Jesus Reaching Others. This conference is an interactive conference and workshop. Includes Group Discussion, illustrations, stories, volunteer opportunities, learner guide for note taking. Nancy is the founder and leader of the Relationship of the Heart Conference/Worskhop. In the past the conference and workshop was lead in Africa, Asia, and the USA. From large cities to villages in far away lands, we all struggle with relationships. Be sure to check out Nancy's website listed on this page. It includes a video from Nancy.
